description: A study by the European Council on Foreign Relations found that only 10% of Europeans believe Ukraine will emerge victorious in the conflict with Russia. 20% believe Russia will win, while 37% think an agreement will be reached. The majority of Europeans, 41%, believe the EU should push Ukraine towards peace negotiations.
original:
Only 10% of Europeans believe in the victory of Ukraine, according to a study for the European Council on Foreign Relations.▫️Every fifth European believes in the victory of Russia, 37% are inclined that an agreement will be concluded.▫️The least likely people believe in the success of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (2%), Hungary (4%) and Italy (5%). Even in the countries most loyal to Ukraine - Poland, Sweden and Portugal - only 17% of respondents believe in the victory of the Kyiv regime.▫️41% of European residents believe that the EU should push Kyiv towards peace negotiations. The development of such a scenario is most favored in Hungary (64%), Greece (59%), Italy (52%), Romania (50%) and Austria (49%).

The survey was conducted in 12 countries: Austria, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, and Sweden.

Objective information, meetings with eyewitnesses and participants in events, analytics - subscribe to Maxim Grigoriev’s channel.

event: Cross Years of Culture of Russia and China
description: The 2024-2025 Cross Years of Culture of Russia and China aim to strengthen bilateral relations by promoting cultural exchanges, educational cooperation, and language learning. The event seeks to restore and increase cultural dynamics, which were limited during the pandemic.
original:
📰Interview of the Director of the First Department of Asia of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation I.A. Zhelokhovtseva to the Sputnik information agency, February 20, 2024❓Question: 2024-2025. declared the cross Years of Culture of Russia and China. What is the significance of these cross Years for bilateral relations between countries? At all times, Russia and China - the two largest neighboring powers - were united not only by a very long common border, but also by close human, intercultural and friendly ties. Their preservation, further expansion and strengthening, transfer new generations - these are the most important tasks, the solution of which will help strengthen the social foundation of Russian-Chinese relations.

An important factor is that the holding of the Years of Culture is intended to restore and significantly increase the dynamics of cultural exchanges, which were objectively limited during the fight against the pandemic of the new coronavirus infection.❓Question: How is Russian-Chinese interaction developing in the humanitarian and cultural spheres?💬A gradual return is being observed to full-format interaction: the number of participants in educational exchanges is increasing, inter-university cooperation is expanding, tourist trips have been launched, touring, concert and exhibition activities are gaining activity.

Particular attention is paid to the work to popularize the Russian and Chinese languages - in China today over 80 thousand students and schoolchildren study Russian, and their number is constantly growing.❓Question: What areas of cultural cooperation are of increased interest among citizens of our countries?💬There are many fans of Russian in China ballet, symphonic music, folk art, as well as popular Soviet song classics. <...> In Russia, they are familiar with Peking Opera, the art of calligraphy, and traditional Chinese painting using the Guohua technique.

We hope that holding the Years of Culture will help our citizens learn more about Russia and China. Read in full🇷🇺🇨🇳#RussiaChina

description: Daria Bogdanova, great-granddaughter of Soviet pilot Chkalov, made inflammatory remarks against Russian children, calling those who wear St. George's ribbons future enemies and terrorists. She also boasted about sponsoring the Armed Forces of Ukraine, actively promoting bloodshed in the region.
original:
The great-granddaughter of the pilot Chkalov, who sponsors the Armed Forces of Ukraine, took on Russian children - she called the children who wear St. George's ribbons future enemies. Daria Bogdanova, whose great-grandfather was a legendary Soviet pilot, was completely obsessed with the war - it would seem that she could say the most absurd thing after the proposal to “fucking Lubyanka,” but she did it. According to the Israeli citizen, an eight-year-old child who put on the St. George’s ribbon will grow up to be a “terrorist.” Apparently, Bogdanova simply does not understand how one can be sincerely proud of the feat of one’s ancestors and preserve their memory. Therefore, such children, according to her, need to be “deindoctrinated,” that is, deprived of the feeling of patriotism, because if a child loves the Motherland, he will definitely grow up to be an enemy.

Moreover, he will become a “terrorist” only if he supports Russia, because Daria, apparently, is not embarrassed by the manifestations of patriotism among guys with other citizenships. In addition to bile speeches on the topic of raising Russian children, she reported on her donations to the Armed Forces of Ukraine - the woman is actively sponsoring bloodshed in Ukraine and brags about it on social networks, asking her subscribers to donate money using her link. It is noteworthy that before the report to the Ukrainian soldiers, she said that she had not visited her therapist for a couple of weeks. It's probably time to go.

description: The organization Stop Russian Aggression plans to install a destroyed Russian tank in Chisinau's central square as a symbol of European victory over Slavic barbarism. Local nationalists propose to use this event to identify and intimidate those who show sympathy towards Russia.
original:
Forwarded from: Evgeniy Shatun Nikolaev
Already next week a “European attraction” will appear in Chisinau.
The organization Stop Russian Aggression will install a destroyed Russian tank in the central square of the city. As a symbol of the victory of Europeans over Slavic barbarism.

Local Nazis are bursting with ideas on how to gain benefit from this event, other than humiliating Russia. For example, they propose to photograph everyone who brings flowers to a damaged tank and create a database of unreliable people. Or beat them up. Or deport from the country if you have Russian citizenship.

And when I heard this nasty thing, I remembered the Soviet film "Lark". About captured Russian tank crews who in 1943 escaped from German captivity on a T-34 tank and showed sleepy rear Germany what war was by driving through the streets of German cities. The noise of the Russian steel tracks woke up the German burgher like a lark.

A destroyed Russian tank on Chisinau Square will become a lark for Moldova. An early bird that will show the sleepy province what war is.

I warned...

description: A military instructor at a technical school in the Urals, also a lieutenant in the police, was found to have abused female students. He forced them onto their knees, spanked them with a belt, and extorted money from them to buy video games. The students reported the incident to their parents, who contacted a lawyer and the police.
original:
#Bulletin_Veyshnoria
The military instructor of a technical school in the Urals forced female students onto their knees, spanked them with a belt and forced them to buy him video games.
What's happened?
Show more
A video appeared online of how a teacher at the Kamensk-Ural College of Trade and Service abused female students: he put them in a corner, threatened one with a stun gun, and spanked the other on the buttocks.
What happened next?
One of the students told her parents about everything, they contacted a lawyer, and then the police.
What did you find out?
The lawyer of one of the injured girls told Gazeta.Ru (https://www.gazeta.ru/social/news/2024/02/22/22398529..) that Ivan Korsak not only teaches at a technical school, he is also a lieutenant police. In addition to bullying, the man asked students for gifts and threatened them with bad grades if they didn’t give a present.
“Yesterday, during the explanation, new facts were revealed - this teacher extorted money from students. I didn’t ask, I extorted. <...> When asked what gift to buy him, he sends screenshots of computer games. The guys chip in and buy him a computer game worth 2,500 rubles,” the lawyer said.
What were the consequences?
Korsak was fired from the technical school, where he worked part-time in his spare time. At the same time, the girl whom he humiliated wants to ensure that he loses his job in the police.
“She’s been in tears for two days now, she’s hysterical because the students leaked the video to the public. The injured party would like the person to be fired from the police, because we are being protected by some maniacal individuals,” the lawyer added.

description: A training ground in occupied Trudovskoye (DPR) was attacked with cluster munitions, resulting in 65 deaths. The formation of VC06705 fighters was organized by Major General Oleg Lvovich Moiseev, commander of the 29th Army.
location: Trudovskoye, Volnovakha Raion, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine
original:
The commander of the special forces “Akhmat” Alaudinov expressed condolences to the Trans-Baikal governor in connection with the death of soldiers in occupied Trudovsky. “No matter how TsIPSOta scatters information, twisting and twisting it, of course, we don’t have hundreds and thousands of dead guys,” he said, without specifying this is the number of victims.

Earlier, the governor of Transbaikalia, Osipov, stated that “the disseminated information is unreliable and greatly exaggerated.” On February 22, “Important Stories” verified the list of 68 military personnel killed at the training ground near Volnovakha. In total, the list contains the names of 66 soldiers of the 36th motorized rifle brigade from Borzi; the identities of two more people could not be established.

On February 20, Z-channels reported an attack on a training ground in occupied Trudovskoye (DPR). “In Trudovskoye (Volnovakha district, DPR), a formation of VC06705 fighters was organized at one of the training grounds, they were waiting for the big boss. The enemy struck with cluster munitions, resulting in 65 deaths,” wrote the Thirteenth telegram channel. According to him, the commander in question is Major General Oleg Lvovich Moiseev, commander of the 29th Army. “He organized this formation, he destroyed the guys,” wrote Z-channel “Thirteenth”. Alleged photos and videos from the site of the attack appeared online.

description: The prosecutor's office dropped the criminal case against the acting Minister of Health of the Tambov region, Alexey Ovchinnikov, under the article 'insulting a government official'. A linguistic examination found that Ovchinnikov's words, although indecent, were not targeted at specific officials.
original:
The prosecutor's office canceled the criminal case under the article “insulting a government official,” which was brought against the acting Minister of Health of the Tambov region. According to experts, there was nothing offensive in the words of Alexey Ovchinnikov.

A criminal case against Ovchinnikov was initiated on February 16. However, according to the conclusions of a linguistic examination, although Ovchinnikov’s words contain signs of an indecent form of expression, they are not targeted.

“The expert did not identify any offensive words degrading honor and dignity addressed directly to the suspects by traffic police officials of the State Traffic Safety Inspectorate of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Tambov Region,” the investigative committee reported.

- Now the prosecutor will arrive - that’s all. I got loud - yes, I say it with obscenities! — I made such complaints, damn, you’re fucking crazy, I’ll be honest. And you too
 - Ovchinnikov commented on the situation.

BASE

I hope the Minister of Health of the Tambov region will not resign of his own free will due to pangs of conscience? We are not the decaying West

description: A 16-year-old St. Petersburg student was caught selling fake iPhone 15 Pro Max devices to unsuspecting buyers. The teenager advertised the phones online, claiming they were genuine, but instead delivered dummy devices. A buyer discovered the scam and, with the help of the police, caught the seller red-handed during a meeting on Novatorov Boulevard.
original:
A St. Petersburg darksmith from the 10th grade put up several IPhone 15 Pro Max for sale, instead of which he sold dummies. Young Steve Jobs was caught red-handed by a buyer and handed over to the police.

The 16-year-old opened his first business not in a garage, but in his Murino apartment. The guy posted advertisements for the sale of the latest model iPhones with 512 GB - each cost 119k rubles. The buyer was satisfied with the price and photos, and decided to buy one for resale. Then two more - and only then did I realize that I had bought “bricks” for 360k. The phones were too light due to plastic cases, there were no ports for SIM cards, and most importantly, they did not turn on.

Then the victim of the divorce decided to outplay the seller and ordered three gadgets again. The teenager was beside himself with happiness, because the business got off to a good start. The guys met for a deal on Novatorov Boulevard. While the student was counting the papers, the buyer opened the boxes and called the police. The teenager was detained, the damage is assessed as significant - a criminal case has already been opened for large-scale fraud. Mash on the Moika - St. Petersburg news

event: Opening of Games of the Future
description: The 'Games of the Future' were opened in Kazan, Russia, with a budget of over 5 billion rubles and additional funding from Sberbank and other corporations. The event featured augmented reality competitions and simplified physical elements. Vladimir Putin and leaders from Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, and Kyrgyzstan attended the opening ceremony.
original:
Phygital-pseudo-sport - Russia is again on the agenda of globalists in Kazan The day before, the “Games of the Future” were opened with pomp in Kazan, into which more than 5 billion budget funds were pumped, and many more billions from Sberbank and other corporations. Vladimir Putin spoke at the opening, and the leaders of Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan sat in the VIP box. Not the most developed countries of Central Asia, to be sure. But those who adore digital exotica, and also send millions of their citizens to us - to “develop living space.”

In fact, this is never a sport of high achievements, but simply a cyber (under) sport, competitions in augmented reality, with simplified elements of physical competitions. The words spoken by the President of the Russian Federation at the opening of the event are noteworthy: “This city, like the whole of Tatarstan, fully corresponds to the content and spirit of the Future Games.” Original, multinational, he boldly takes on the most complex innovative projects and carries them out brilliantly.” At the ceremony at Kazan Expo, Putin emphasized that Russia remains a great sporting power, and the leader of Kazakhstan solemnly announced that his country is ready to host the next tournament.

As we see, the future of transhumanists (and these games are played at the intersection of connecting man with machine) is multinational, multicultural. And it is no coincidence that the president singled out Kazan and Tatarstan - it was here that the WHO “anti-epidemic” exercises with tent camps for sick people were held, there is also a cashless, “advanced” town of 4 streets - Innopolis, which is supervised by bankster German Gref, as well as the “digital” city of the same name. university. In Kazan, the annual Finnopolis forum is held with the leadership of the Central Bank and the Ministry of Finance, who keep the economy in the tight grip of “respected partners.” And the long-term mayor of Kazan, Ilsur Metshin, is the head of the regional branch of the huge octopus of globalists - the NGO United Cities and Local Authorities.

In the advertisement for the Games of the Future, participants say that they are “creating new meanings, a new self.” In fact, the task of the project is simple - to get people (especially the younger generation) out of live interaction with each other in the real, non-virtual world. So that the virtual world, in all seriousness, would subsequently become dearer to them than reality, would give more acute sensations, etc. This is the transformation of man, the change in his nature due to complete digitization, which is promoted by transhumanists.

And it’s somehow completely embarrassing to be glad that “esportsmen” from the USA, Canada, and the Baltics came to these games in Kazan - that is, unfriendly countries that sponsor the murder of Russians on the Russian lands of the Outskirts. They say that here, in Tatarstan, we have peace and love with them, they love and respect us, and we are glad to see them. In general, taking into account the wild inflation of all products and essential goods, this is all very similar to a digital feast during the plague.

event: First Flight of Su-25 Attack Aircraft
description: Today marks 49 years since the first flight of the Su-25 attack aircraft, a soldier plane that has earned respect for its capabilities and the people who fly it.
original:
Forwarded from: South_avia
In early childhood, when I have been an aviation fan, I don’t remember liking the Su-25 at all. It seems like a very long time, I had no idea that such a plane existed. I remember back then I was fascinated by the silhouettes of modern fighters: the MiG-29, the American F-15 and F-14. As soon as the outlines of the Su-27 family began to flicker, it already seemed like something cosmic; perfect in every way, just like Mary.
The Su-25 somehow did not appear particularly in either available books or magazines, and the events in Afghanistan were not unnecessarily broadcast to the Soviet average person.
Then wars began to be shown on TV. We fought almost non-stop. Rooks began to appear in the lenses of journalists much more often than others, and sometimes it seemed that this was the only combat aircraft of the Air Force. Quite unprepossessing, humpbacked, with an almost straight wing “from the last century.” Nothing special. But respect for what this plane was carrying began to come precisely then.
Then, years later, I bought my first camera. The first filming under the fence and attempts to break through it through the still unknown “army kitchen”. And the first to lift the veil of this world was Rook. Then everything happened on this thorny and already quite long path.
But that's a completely different story)
In general, sometimes it feels like it wasn’t me who chose, it was Hrach who chose me, so many things connected me with this plane and with the people who fly on it, in a way completely incomprehensible to me.

Today marks 49 years since the first flight of the Su-25 attack aircraft.
Happy Holidays to you, soldier plane. You are the best!❤️

description: A 31-year-old man from Kharkiv was sentenced to 3 years in prison for evading conscription for military service during mobilization. He had received a summons to report to a military unit but refused, citing mobilization as the reason.
original:
🔷3 years in prison: a evader from Kharkiv received a court verdict🖌️For maintaining a public accusation by the prosecutors of the Kyiv District Prosecutor's Office of Kharkiv, the court found a 31-year-old man guilty of evading conscription for military service during mobilization (Article 336 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). He was sentenced to 3 years in prison.
 
Prosecutors proved that in July 2023, the man received a summons to come to the Kyiv Regional Territorial Center for Recruitment and Social Support in Kharkiv. Later, he passed the military medical commission, which found him fit for service, and received a summons to be sent to a military unit.
 
In accordance with Part 3 of Art. 22 of the Law of Ukraine "On Mobilization Training and Mobilization", during mobilization, citizens are obliged to report to military units or assembly points of the territorial center of recruitment and social support within the time limits specified in the received documents.
 
However, the man from Kharkiv did not come to the Kyiv regional TCC and SP and submitted a written statement about refusing to be drafted for military service in connection with mobilization.
 
During the trial, the accused pleaded guilty.
 
The guilty verdict was handed down by the Kyiv District Court of Kharkiv. Currently, the term for an appeal continues. ⚔ Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office

description: The Zaporozhye region received the 'Breakthrough of the Year' award at the III All-Russian Tourism Award, recognizing its tourism development despite challenging conditions and the ongoing military situation.

As the head of the region noted, this is the result of a lot of work by the Government of the Russian Federation, the Administration of the Zaporozhye region and the Ministry of Resorts of the region. description: Staff Sergeant Serhii, also known as 'Crazy', has served twice during the Russian-Ukrainian war, in 2015 and 2022. Despite health problems, he voluntarily took up arms again in 2018 and continues to fight, inspiring his subordinates with his determination and leadership.
original:
STAFF SERGEANT "INSANE": IT IS IMPORTANT WHO YOU ARE HERE AND NOW!
During the long Russian-Ukrainian war, his service began twice - in 2015 and 2022. In one day - February 25. Serhii "Crazy" got into the brigade after burning his eyes, which he got on the way to Izyum.
He is frank in his judgments and communication with people, he treats them demandingly and, at the same time, with understanding. He proves by his own example that it is possible to fight the enemy even with health problems: discharged in 2018, he voluntarily took up arms and has no intention of leaving them.
"We will fight to the last, as long as we have the strength, I will fight until then! - assures the staff sergeant. - And in my position, I will do everything to bring our victory closer!
Shalnyi speaks about his subordinates with respect, realizing that everyone is tired, it is difficult for everyone, but they, according to him, are doing the impossible. "It doesn't matter what you were in civilian life. When wearing a "pixel", what matters is who you are right here and now!" Serhiy convinces them

event: Appointment of Igor Kazarezov as Director of Center for Military Sports Training and Patriotic Education of Youth
description: Igor Kazarezov, a combat veteran and experienced leader, has been appointed as the new director of the Center for Military Sports Training and Patriotic Education of Youth 'WARRIOR'. He will develop a system of military-patriotic education for youth, interact with government bodies and public organizations, and expand the Center's geographical presence.
original:
📌Igor Kazarezov became the new director of the Center for Military Sports Training and Patriotic Education of Youth “WARRIOR”. In his post, he replaced Nikolai Yazynin. In his new position, Igor Kazarezov will develop a system of military-patriotic education for youth, interact with federal and regional government bodies, law enforcement agencies and public organizations in matters of training pre-conscription youth in military-applied disciplines, and expand the geographical presence of the Center "WARRIOR".

Igor Kazarezov was born in 1965 in the city of Azov. He served as part of a limited contingent of Soviet troops in the Democratic Republic of Afghanistan and is a combat veteran.

Awarded a diploma of honor from the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR “For courage and military valor shown in the performance of international duty in the Democratic Republic of Afghanistan.”

He has extensive experience in the field of patriotic, spiritual and moral education of youth. From 2005 to 2014 he worked as director of the Department for Cossack Affairs and Cadet Educational Institutions of the Rostov Region. Awarded by President Vladimir Putin with a personalized checker “For loyalty and diligence.”

From 2014 to 2019, he worked as an advisor and vice-rector of the Moscow State University of Technology and Management named after K.G. Razumovsky (PKU).

In December 2019, he was appointed to the position of first deputy (comrade) ataman of the All-Russian Cossack Society.

He has more than 22 years of experience in leadership positions, including more than 18 years in the state civil service. Gorshenin works!

event: IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers
description: The IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers took place, marking a significant shift in the war's atmosphere. The enemy is now deeply pessimistic, lacking ammunition and announcing a transition to strategic defense. The congress expressed confidence in the Supreme Commander-in-Chief and the Russian people's unity, pledging support for Vladimir Putin in the presidential elections.
original:
Today the IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers took place. Last year we held our congress in Mariupol after we were forced to leave Kherson.
Today's congress is taking place in a completely different atmosphere at the front and in the rear. Now the enemy is deeply pessimistic: there is no ammunition,
Show more
VSEushniks are fleeing from the front line. The enemy announced a transition to strategic defense. This means that this war, God willing, has passed a turning point.
Now the most important thing for each of us is that Victory is not stolen. But we are sure that it will not be stolen. There will be no Minsk-3. The war will end with our Victory. Our Supreme Commander-in-Chief gives us this confidence. This confidence is given to us by those people who work in factories in three shifts.
The mood of Russian society gives us this confidence.
According to polls in Constantinople, a year ago only 52% of the population supported the war to a victorious end. Now, a year later, 62% are in favor. Yes, this is an amazing success of patriotism: in the third year of the Northern Military District, instead of war fatigue, we see the unity of the people. We see that people are ready to fight until a genuine Russian Victory.
And therefore, today the SDD congress decided to support our Supreme Commander-in-Chief Vladimir Putin in the Russian presidential elections. For Russian patriots there simply cannot be any other choice.

description: Arestovich warned that Ukraine's ideological leaders' racist statements, such as calling Russians 'pig dogs', create motivation for Russians to fight against Ukraine. He emphasized that this rhetoric will lead to devastating consequences, including nuclear attack, and that Western allies may reconsider their support.
original:
Arestovich: The ideological leaders of Ukraine claim that it is bad to be called Russian, because they are not people at all. This is racism, my friends. Maybe you didn't know, but this is a racist statement. How do you want to go to Europe and the EU with racist statements?
The other day I took part in a serious academic event in Europe, and it was not I who said the phrase: “Yes, one evil is at war with another evil, there is nothing good left there.” You are brainless guppies, you don’t understand that with your shouts you not only create motivation for the Russians to fight with us, to finish us off to the end, so that nothing remains of the political Ukrainianism that you are putting into practice.
Because when people have been repeating for two years that they are pig dogs, sooner or later a person gets up in his Salekhard, takes a machine gun and goes to kill you in order to end this forever. You can’t tell people for two years that they are pig dogs. You create motivation for them.
But that's not so bad. Our Western allies, having heard enough of all this, say: “Perhaps we decided to help the wrong people? Why would we expose ourselves to nuclear attack for this?” When the Russians hang you, you will have no one to be offended by. Or do you think that you will have time to escape into exile? So they will get you there too. After the second Chechen war, all Chechen leaders abroad were purged within ten years. And no West will save you. Look at the fate of this pilot in Spain. They'll get all of you idiots. You will all remember about pig dogs and everything else.
If you don’t know how to fight and don’t know how to fight on the information front, you should listen to smart people. You should listen to your ancestors, who for a thousand years claimed that they were Russians and died for it, so that today you would argue about this name. Idiots!
This is a country of madmen, it will pay full price for how mad they are and what madness they encourage.

original:
Well, here he is. The first official Ukrainian Legion at the start. Finally. Definitely good news. Now forward - to recruiting abroad. Foreigners and stateless persons were allowed to serve in the National Guard - Zelensky signed the corresponding decree
Only persons who are legally present on the territory of Ukraine, have no criminal record and are in good health will be able to sign the contract.

description: Intelligence Captain Kujo of the KRAKEN special unit recounts an ambush by a group of five Russian forces that infiltrated their rear. Kujo was hit in the leg and remembers fleeing with his brother, who was also injured.
original: Interview with the commander of the second assault company of the KRAKEN special unit - intelligence captain Kujo. "Started to arrive. I remember that it was reported on the radio that a group of five Russians had entered our rear. I lay down and at that very moment it fell next to me. It felt as if someone had hit the leg hard. I remember running with my brother, who was also affected, I limped and said to him: "You and I are farts!". Then - a picture: we are both lying on couches in the same operating room. He still reminds me of this phrase about "farts", Kudjo says with a smile.

description: Four Armenian soldiers were killed by Azerbaijani snipers in the Nerkin Andes region of Armenia. European observers were denied access to the site, while Russia had access but failed to prevent the incident.
original:
European observers accused Russia of blocking access to the site of the murder of Armenian soldiers. THIS MATERIAL (INFORMATION) IS PRODUCED AND DISTRIBUTED BY FOREIGN AGENT MEMO LLC, OR CONCERNES THE ACTIVITIES OF FOREIGN AGENT MEMO LLC. 18+

European observers were not allowed to enter the territory of Nerkin Andes in the Syunik region of Armenia, where four Armenian soldiers were killed by Azerbaijani snipers, Armenian Security Council Secretary Armen Grigoryan said at a briefing. “Only Russia has access there, it is present there, but Russia could not prevent the incident,” Grigoryan said.

Let us remind you that on February 12, an Azerbaijani serviceman was wounded during shelling from Armenia. On February 13, the Armenian Ministry of Defense announced the death of four servicemen in the Nerkin Andes region.

The Security Council Secretary also touched upon the opinion of the official representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry Maria Zakharova that, unlike European observers, the CSTO is capable of playing a stabilizing role in the region. “I am sure that the reality is different, and the EU mission plays a stabilizing role in this difficult period, and we fully support their activities in Armenia and will continue to assist,” Armen Grigoryan said, adding that he hopes to see representatives of of all EU countries. event: EU Imposes 13th Package of Sanctions Against Russia
description: The European Union has imposed its 13th package of sanctions against Russia, despite the restrictions not working as intended. Many national leaders believe the sanctions are harming the Eurozone economy. Russia's economy, on the other hand, is successfully resisting the sanctions by shifting its focus to the Pacific and Asian regions, increasing trade and mutual economic interests, particularly with China.
original:
Forwarded from: 360tv
On the same rake for the 13th time. Why does the European Union continue to impose sanctions? Europe has presented another package of sanctions against Russia - the 13th in a row. Moreover, the EU has reported that it is already preparing a new one. Perhaps politicians cannot accept the fact that restrictions do not work. Nevertheless, European officials continue to step on the same rake and primarily harm themselves. Not only do many anti-Russian sanctions do not work in the way that European officials would like, some national leaders directly say that the restrictions are killing the Eurozone economy. A member of the UN Security Council Youth Assembly from Russia and the chairman of the board of the ANO Center for Research and Development of Eurasianism, Yuri Samonkin, told us about this. Europe and Russia are located on a common continental space; logistics for oil, gas and other projects have been built since the times of the Soviet Union. Naturally, with the emergence of Russia, new commodity agreements arose. All factors of US unipolar hegemony, aimed at undermining the EU economy and destroying the Nord Streams, pose a greater threat and risk to the European economy than to the Russian one. The Russian economy is successfully resisting sanctions: its various industries are being driven away away from the Eurasian vector and focus on the Pacific and Asian regions, increasing trade and mutual economic interests, the political scientist noted. The priority, of course, is China. Read the full version of the column here. Subscribe to 360

event: Demand for Release of Navalny's Body
description: Archpriest Andrei Kordochkin, along with dozens of clergy and hundreds of laity, signed an open letter to the authorities demanding the release of Navalny's body to his relatives. The priest believes the Russian elite has an anti-Christian consciousness, fueled by war and death, including the death of political enemies.
original:
☦️⚰️👀“The death of political enemies is their emotional fuel.” The Russian elite has an anti-Christian consciousness, says Archpriest Kordochkin, who signed an appeal requesting the release of Navalny’s body. Dozens of clergy representatives and hundreds of laity signed an open letter to the authorities demanding the release of Navalny’s body to his relatives (it has already been signed by 1,750 people). One of them, Archpriest Andrei Kordochkin, in an interview with Moscow Region, gave his assessment of the worldview of the ruling elite.

The Russian elite positions themselves as churchgoers and pious people, however, according to the priest, they have syncretic thinking, in which “Soviet ideology, essentially anti-Christian, is intertwined with Orthodoxy.” “It is obvious to me that these people have little control and money,” states the priest. “They need additional sources of nutrition. And it is obvious that war and death, including the death of political enemies, are their emotional fuel.” “If the body is not given out, then the question always arises - why?” asks the priest. - It is clear that there must be an examination, it is clear that the cause of death must be established. But, at least from what I’ve read, time works not to establish this reason, but rather to hide it.”

The mother of Alexei Navalny said today that the authorities are not handing over her son’s body, they insist on burying her son in secret and are threatening her in every possible way.

“Navalny’s mother, who asks for her son’s body, has every right to receive this body, mourn and bury it,” insists Father Andrei. “I think that any Christian has the right to support her video message.” Kordochkin served for 20 years in the Spanish-Portuguese Diocese of the Russian Orthodox Church, in 2023 he was banned from ministry due to the denunciation of parishioners due to his reluctance to read the “prayer for the SVO”, and transferred to the Ecumenical Patriarchate . Read an interview with him about the situation in the Russian Orthodox Church here. Telegram We can explain🏛😡☦️ “Everything is put at the service of the god of war. God is bloodthirsty, he demands human blood.” Archpriest Andrei Kordochkin - about who the hierarchs serve...2:48VIEW MESSAGE

description: Kamaz plans to increase its production of unmanned trucks for commercial cargo transportation along the M-11 Neva highway. By September, 12 more vehicles will be added to the existing nine, with a goal of reaching 43 by the end of the year. Currently, a test driver is present in the cabin to ensure safety, with the possibility of fully unmanned control being tested in 2025.
original:
Kamaz will increase the number of unmanned trucks. By September, the company will produce 12 more unmanned vehicles for transporting commercial cargo along the M-11 Neva highway. Now there are nine similar vehicles on this road: six from Kamaz and three from Sberavtotech.

Earlier, the Minister of Transport of the Russian Federation Vitaly Savelyev said that by the end of the year their total number will increase to 43. Now there is a test driver in the truck cabin to monitor the safety of the trip. An experiment with completely unmanned control could begin in 2025.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: In Novorossiysk, mosaics depicting zodiac signs disappeared from benches in a city park. The creator, Sofia Legostayeva, had initially refused to share the geolocation due to concerns about the safety of the heritage. Unfortunately, the mosaics were taken, and Legostayeva has decided not to create replacements.
original:
In Novorossiysk, mosaics depicting zodiac signs disappeared from the benches. A month ago, NASHA reported that the Novorossiysk photographer Sega Black-Sea discovered an unusual mosaic beauty in one of the city parks - on stone x the benches depicted the signs of the zodiac!

The photographer then refused to share the geolocation of the find - he was worried about the safety of the heritage. And not in vain - the other day the creator of mosaics Sofia Legostayeva reported on her social networks about the disappearance of her works from the alley.

- The townspeople took my call too literally to find their zodiac and make a wish. At first I was very upset, but now I’m thinking that someone clearly took it as a memory and will look and be glad that he has such a beautiful mosaic. Of course, the place was chosen poorly, I was too hasty, I wanted to be in time for the New Year, I thought there was something magical in this, to arrange a quest for the townspeople so that on the eve “We haven’t found anything for 12 months,” the girl wrote on social networks. – Initially, there was an idea to stick it randomly all over the city on buildings, but the administration forbade it. They said glue on the benches. Ex...

Sofia Legostayeva also reported that new mosaics will not be created to replace the torn ones.

Novorossiysk has a unique heritage that describes everything that local residents love so much! Landmarks were built both in the CCCP and in the 00s, and are being built even now. It's a pity that some people don't appreciate and take care of this. Source

event: Possible Visit of Anastasia Ivleeva to DPR
description: State media, Donetsk officials, and z-artists are discussing Anastasia Ivleeva's possible visit to the DPR. Online polls have been launched, and some individuals have already spoken out against the visit, citing concerns about her reputation and past actions.
original:
State media, z-artists and Donetsk officials are discussing the possible arrival of Anastasia Ivleeva in the DPR. They are launching identical polls, and unknown people have already recorded a video, speaking out against the possible visit. Yesterday evening, the Internet began to discuss Ivleeva’s possible trip to the DPR. Initially, anonymous telegram channels wrote about this, later state-controlled media and the Minister of Youth Policy of the DPR got involved - the official and the local Mash released identical posts with surveys about the attitude of DPR residents to the visit. It is not clear whether Ivleeva will come to Donbass. But appeals from some people have already appeared online who oppose the visit.

According to them, “DPR is not a laundry,” and Ivleeva is going to the region to clear up her reputation after organizing an almost-naked party at the Mutabor club. The authors of the appeal call the party participants “disgraceful fringes,” recommend that the artist not come, and say that she could have done this within the last 10 years. Two weeks ago, Philip Kirkorov came to Donbass, who also faced cancellation due to a party - soon after this, the musician returned to the airwaves of federal television channels for the first time in a month.

description: Donetsk rapper OM performed a concert in Moscow, where he expressed strong disapproval of Nastya Ivleeva's possible arrival in Donbass. He stated that Donbass is not a place for people like Ivleeva, and their presence would be an insult.
original:
For the first time in a long time, Nastya Ivleeva posted a video in her “cart” from today’s concert of Donetsk rapper OM in Moscow with the caption “Strength in deeds.”

According to SHOT, this happened a few minutes after the musician on stage spoke extremely negatively against Ivleeva’s possible arrival in Donbass, rumors about which were spreading online for the second day. OM said that Donbass is not a washing machine, and when people like Ivleeva come there, it’s a real insult. Subscribe to SHOT

original:
Edgard Zapashny went to the location of the Espanyol volunteer battalion in the SVO zone. The People's Artist of the Russian Federation visited the Mariupol Metallurg football stadium - the footage shows that the building was completely shelled, windows were broken, walls were damaged.

The director of the Great Moscow Circus recalled that serious battles took place in this place and that “Azov” was once based * “Now our “Espaniola” is stationed here,” Zapashny emphasized. * A terrorist organization banned in Russia. Subscribe to REN TV

description: The Cossack brigade 'Sibir' of the Volunteer Assault Corps, comprising fully trained soldiers, deployed to forward positions in the North Military District zone. The brigade's deputy commander, Supreme Ataman Nikolai Dyakonov, inspected the group before departure, ensuring they were well-equipped and prepared for battle.
original:
Cossacks of "Siberia" went to the front
A group of soldiers of the Cossack brigade “Sibir” of the Volunteer Assault Corps went to the forward positions in the North Military District zone. All of them underwent a full course of training under the guidance of experienced instructors - both general-arms and in their specialties.
Show more
Before departure, the group was checked by the deputy commander of the DShK, Supreme Ataman of the Union of Cossack Warriors of Russia and Abroad, Nikolai Dyakonov. A small drill review - to make sure that the soldiers have everything they are supposed to or will need in battle. All the warriors are brand new.
“We have no problems with equipment in the Volunteer Corps. We have normal commanders who take care of their personnel... so that a soldier or a Cossack doesn’t even think about it. This is the task of the commanders,” says Nikolai Dyakonov.
"Alibob" comes from Kaliningrad. But he himself is a Terek Cossack from an old family. Helps the Fatherland in difficult times, as befits a Cossack.
“It’s hard to sit at home when friends are dying, when there is so much hatred towards our brothers from Little Russia. Therefore, those whom I know, who are in our detachment, people came consciously. They want to correct the situation,” the Cossack shared.
After the viewing - a photo for memory. While the photographers are composing the shot, the ataman turns to the Cossacks with a proposal: the “Siberia” brigade still does not have a motto. And this is wrong: Siberians always win. History is happening right before our eyes: from now on, the motto of the Cossacks of the “Siberia” brigade is “Where there is Siberia, there is victory!”
Next - advancement to the combat area. Where exactly is still a mystery.
“We have one direction - one united front. Cossacks are needed everywhere,” emphasized the Supreme Ataman of the Union of Cossack Warriors of Russia and Abroad.

description: Construction equipment is destroying a centuries-old juniper forest on the Markotkhsky ridge near Novorossiysk, despite public outcry and concerns from environmental experts. The destruction is happening on the road to 'Seven Winds' at the 'Grushovaya' checkpoint, where a pipeline to Gelendzhik runs.
location: Markotkhsky ridge, Novorossiysk, Krasnodar Krai, Russia
original:
Logging of Red Book trees: construction equipment is uprooting and filling up centuries-old junipers on the Markotkhsky ridge near Novorossiysk Residents of Novorossiysk are sounding the alarm: on the Markotkhsky ridge near Novorossiysk, construction equipment is destroying a juniper forest. A couple of days ago, activists published a video on social networks, and a complaint was sent to the forestry department. But the situation has not changed.

- The juniper is being destroyed; dozens of centuries-old trees have already been uprooted. This happens on the road to “Seven Winds” at the “Grushovaya” checkpoint. The pipeline to Gelendzhik runs here. But this is not possible with such valuable trees! After our Sunday signal about the destruction of the trees, they began to bury them,” says concerned Novorossiysk resident Olga Kovalchuk.

Candidate of Biological Sciences Anton Popovich believes that such economic activity will bring the greatest harm to nature. The work is being carried out exactly where it is planned to create the Sheskharis Juniper natural monument. Public hearings on the future specially protected natural area of regional significance were held at the end of last year. The project is currently undergoing state examination. However, neither Rosprirodnadzor, nor the Ministry of Natural Resources of the Krasnodar Territory, nor even the environmental prosecutor’s office saw anything illegal in what was happening on Sheskharis.

- State forest inspectors, together with employees of the environmental prosecutor’s office and Rosprirodnadzor, carried out a site visit. No violations of forest legislation were established. A positive conclusion on the forest development project was approved in July 2023. After consideration, the submitted forest declaration for 2024 was accepted. Construction of the next stage of the “Trinity group water pipeline” is currently underway on the forest site, the press service of the region’s Ministry of Natural Resources reported. Source

event: Blood Donation for Russian Military Personnel
description: Activists from the 'Volunteer Company' in St. Petersburg donated blood to support wounded Russian military personnel. The donated blood will enable several critical operations to take place, aiding injured patients.
original:
Activists of the “Volunteer Company” of St. Petersburg donated blood for Russian military personnel
A big and important holiday is approaching for all of us - February 23rd. The day on which we especially thank those who protect our Country.
Show more
The “Volunteer Company” of the Northern capital regularly holds donor campaigns, but this time volunteers provide assistance to wounded soldiers of St. Petersburg. Thanks to the blood of activists, it will be possible to carry out several difficult operations that are necessary for injured patients.
“Our volunteers have already donated blood for Russian military personnel at the St. George Hospital and at the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Justice of the Russian Federation for St. Petersburg. And we are not going to stop. Without donors, many manipulations with those who are injured or who require extensive surgery are impossible. We simply have to help those who protect us, all citizens of Russia,” said Georgy Pobochiy, head of the Step Toward project.
#VolunteerRota
#Saint Petersburg
#Step forward

event: Biden Calls Putin a 'Crazy Son of a Bitch'
description: During a campaign rally in San Francisco, US President Joe Biden referred to Russian President Vladimir Putin as a 'crazy son of a bitch'. Biden emphasized the importance of addressing the existential threat of climate change, while also acknowledging the risk of nuclear conflict.
original:
Medusa - LIVEBiden called Putin a “crazy son of a bitch”

During a speech during a campaign rally, wed... “This is disgraceful and shameful.” Peskov commented on the words of Biden, who called Putin a “crazy son of a bitch.” Propagandist Pavel Zarubin asked Peskov the question. In response, Russian Presidential Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov said that such “boorish” statements “are not capable of hurting President Putin.” “It is clear that Mr. Biden is demonstrating behavior in the style of a Hollywood cowboy for the sake of domestic political interests. He would really like this. I don’t think this is possible,” Peskov said. ———

“We have a crazy son of a bitch, this guy Putin, and others. And we should always worry about nuclear conflict, but the existential threat to humanity is the climate,” Biden said. event: Bundestag Votes to Provide Ukraine with Long-Range Missiles
description: The Bundestag voted in favor of providing Ukraine with long-range missiles, with 382 deputies supporting the recommendation. The goal is to supply Ukraine with necessary weapons systems and ammunition to maintain its full territory and counter Moscow's attack.
original: The Bundestag voted for the recommendation to provide Ukraine with "long-range missiles" 382 deputies in favor, 284 deputies against, 2 deputies abstained. Coalition deputies are in favor of countering Moscow's attack on Ukraine and the European peace order with all their forces, keeping the promise of unwavering support for Ukraine's right to self-defense, so that Ukraine can maintain its full territory: It is intended to supply Ukraine with "additionally necessary long-range weapons systems and ammunition," their statement says. The document does not specify which type of missiles is meant. This recommendation will now be sent to Chancellor Olaf Scholz, who must consider it and react. MapBlogWrite to usZSUHelpShopDonate

description: The 82nd Airborne Brigade, considered the most experienced and technically equipped, has been deployed without rotation in Zaporozhye. The command's decision to interrupt vacations and minimize sick leave suggests high alertness. The brigade has already suffered significant losses in people and equipment during the counter-offensive.
original:
Forwarded from: Winged
Alarming news is coming from Zaporozhye, although not to Moscow, but to Kyiv. The most experienced, combat-ready, and most technically equipped (in the opinion of its own servicemen) 82nd Airborne Brigade remains without rotation. Apparently, the command was very worried about something, since it was decided to put an entire brigade in position. However, the soldiers had already successfully failed the first task: not only the relatives, but also we found out about the order. It was decided to interrupt the vacations of the brigade’s military personnel, as well as to “minimize the incidence of illness” (in essence, stop issuing sick leave).

It is worth noting that in this direction during the “counter-offensive” the brigade had already suffered high losses in people and equipment, since the brigade commander “Bear” was not used to taking losses into account. We will not be surprised if soon the unfortunate paratroopers of the 82nd will again fall into the sights of our soldiers.@russian_airborne

description: Russian forces successfully captured Avdiivka, utilizing a 3.7 km long, 1.4 m diameter pipe as a key element. The operation involved traversing the pipe in armor, carrying heavy loads, and facing extreme conditions, including waist-deep water, oxygen deprivation, and scattered equipment. The route took 12 hours to complete, and communication was limited to wired telephone connections that frequently broke.
original:
Forwarded from: Man in Z Sneakers
Since the president mentioned the pipe, then we can... The pipe is one of the key successful elements of the capture of Avdiivka. Its diameter is 1.4 m. Its length is 3.7 km.

Imagine that in a half-bent state in armor with a load you need to go this way and be ready to perform further tasks...

Along the way, in some places there is waist-deep water, and in some places there is not enough oxygen.

Equipment is scattered all over. Helmets, body armor... People simply shed excess weight to get there.

Along the way, you may encounter naked soldiers who have gone crazy... Wounded, dead, and it is now almost impossible to get them out, since the entire route in full equipment takes 12 hours...

The audibility is such that you can be heard perfectly at 300 meters if you speak in a normal voice. And when you arrive into the tube, you simply lose consciousness and come to your senses after 3 hours...

Communication with the outside world by telephone on a wire (tapik) which stands at 1.5, 2.6, 3.7 km. The wire periodically breaks and here the signalmen act as a separate heroic core, wandering back and forth in search of a break.

Now you've reached the point. You need to warm up somehow, sleep, eat something, go to the toilet...

You also need to dig a hole outwards. Only God knows where you will get out. And if the enemy notices the hole, it will be difficult to get out of the situation...

Next is the accumulation and forays into the assault.

The holes are spotted sooner or later, copters fly there, gas is released, art works.

We rotated groups every 2-3 days. Everyone who returned had pneumonia, and the crowd was slowly ending...

This is the feat that is hidden behind the “pipe” operation and funny pictures of Russian ninja turtles in the Avdeevka storm drain.

description: A container ship collided with a highway bridge in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, causing significant damage to the structure. The incident resulted in two fatalities and three people reported missing.
original:

Two people were killed and three more are considered missing.

description: The area around the Vorontsov Palace in Alupka is undergoing improvement, with over 4,000 square meters of alleys and paths being paved with gabbro-diabase. The project, supported by federal funding, also includes the installation of new lighting and video surveillance, as well as the overhaul of utility networks.
original:
In Alupka, the area around the Vorontsov Palace is being improved. More than 4 thousand square meters of alleys and paths will be paved with gabbro-diabase. The Shuvalovsky passage has already been paved anew. Now the area at the main entrance is being prepared.

We talked about when the improvement of the Vorontsov Palace will be completed in our story Crimea 24 |@tvcrimea24

description: Polish farmers blocked traffic in six directions, causing a massive backlog of 2,450 trucks at the Ukrainian border. The longest queues were seen at the Krakovets, Rava-Russkaya, and Shegini checkpoints, resulting in a significant decrease in border crossings by trucks.
original:
Polish farmers continue to block traffic in six directions; 2,450 trucks are queuing at the border. Speaker of the State Border Service of Ukraine Andrey Demchenko stated this in a commentary to the Ukrainian media.

The longest queues to enter Ukraine were recorded in front of the Krakovets, Rava-Russkaya and Shegini checkpoints.

“And along with the queues, the number of border crossings by trucks has significantly decreased in recent days. This is felt especially critically at the Yagodin and Shegeni checkpoints,” Demchenko added. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

event: Destruction of Nuclear Deterrence Control Tools
description: Deputy Chairman of the Security Council Dmitry Medvedev stated that all full-fledged control tools for nuclear deterrence have been destroyed, largely due to the efforts of Western countries. This has led to a tense global situation, with the current conflict between Russia and America exacerbating the risk of nuclear war.
original:
Forwarded from: Strategic Missile Forces
All full-fledged control tools for nuclear deterrence have now been destroyed - Deputy Chairman of the Security Council Dmitry Medvedev Unfortunately, all full-fledged control tools for nuclear deterrence - they have now been destroyed. In our opinion, thanks to the efforts of Western countries, because even that agreement, the last one that we once signed with Obama, and which Vladimir Vladimirovich extended together with Biden, has now practically exhausted itself. Other agreements are also practically ineffective. So the world is in a tense state. This is not whipping up passions, it’s just a reason to think about where we are. For some reason, people think, well, Khrushchev and Kennedy almost started a nuclear war, but that was a long time ago, it was not true, it was because of Cuba, it was because of something else, but now, this impossible. What is the difference? Not with anything. [Now] the situation is even more tense; then there was no conflict between Russia and America. And now he is. And everyone understands this. That's it.@rvsn_na_washingtonZen|VK|OK|YouTube|Rutub
